div.p: THE TIME AND HAS NOTHING TO SAY ABOUT SYRIA.

NOTHING ABOUT SYRIA. GEORGE CLOONEY WAS ASKED ABOUT
THE SYRIA SITUATION AND HE DODGED THE SITUATION.

LEFTIES JOINING US? >> MAYBE THEY FEEL THEY DON'T
NEED THE MAJORITY VOICE TO BE HEARD ON THIS ISSUE.
IT CERTAINLY LOOKS LIKE YOU, ME AND A LOT OF OTHER PEOPLE ARE
OPPOSED TO INVOLVEMENT. BECAUSE WE'RE SICK OF WAR,
THAT'S WHY. >> WELL, ALL RIGHT.
I'M NOT OPPOSED AS LONG AS THE INVOLVEMENT MAKES SENSE.
SO I WANT TO SEE WHAT EXACTLY IT WOULD BE.
BUT YOU SAID -- CORRECT ME IF I'M WRONG HERE BECAUSE I'M

AN ELEMENT OF FEAR WITH THE HOLLYWOOD LEFT BECAUSE THEY
DON'T WANT TO CRITICIZE THE PRESIDENT BECAUSE HE'S A BLACK
MAN, HE'S THEIR GUY, THEY'RE TREADING SOFTLY.

IN MANY LIBERALS' MINDS ABOUT HOW FAR TO CON DETERMINE A
PARTICULAR ACTION BY THIS PRESIDENT.
THEY WANT TO TREAD SOFTLY BECAUSE THEY KNOW THAT THERE A

REPUBLICANS. >> ALSO THERE ARE SOME
DEMOCRATS. I WANT TO PURSUE THIS POINT
BECAUSE I THINK IT'S AN INTERESTING POINT.

FIRST PLACE. HE'S THEIR GUY.

NOTHING BECAUSE THEY DON'T WANT TO DAMAGE THEIR GUY?
>> I THINK CERTAINLY THAT DOES MEASURE INTO IT.
TO WHAT EXTENT, I CAN'T TELL YOU.
FIRST OF ALL, I WOULD -- I'LL BE THE FIRST TO PROCLAIM THAT HE'S
NOT MY PROGRESSIVE. >> BUT YOU VOTED FOR HIM.
>> WELL, I DIDN'T WANT TO VOTE FOR THE OTHER GUY.
>> ARE YOU DISAPPOINTED IN PRESIDENT OBAMA?
>> YEAH. >> ON A SCALE OF ONE TO TEN, TEN
BEING THE MOST DISAPPOINTED, WHERE ARE YOU?
>> SEVEN. >> YOU YOURSELF VERY CONSISTENT
THROUGHOUT YOUR WHOLE LIFE AND I RESPECT THAT, A BIG UNION MAN.

SUPPORTING ANY MILITARY ACTION AGAINST IRAN, FOR EXAMPLE, WHEN
IT IF THEY CONTINUE THEIR NUCLEAR PROGRAM, I MEAN, WHEN

SEND THING IS I'D LIKE TO KNOW WHAT THE GRAND TOTAL OF DEAD

HERE, 20 DEAD HERE, 10, 20, 20, 10.
IT BECOMES FRIGHTENING. WHEN THAT GRAND TOTAL IS EVER

AWAY WHAT SADDAM HUSSEIN KILLED. YOU'RE DEALING WITH A LOT OF BAD

THE FREEDOM. BUT WHEN YOU HAVE PEOPLE LIKE
ASSAD GASSING CIVILIANS AND THERE'S NOBODY GOING TO STOP
THAT, I GET WORRIED FOR THE WORLD.
I'LL GIVE YOU THE LAST WORD. >> I DON'T WANT THE LAST WORD

THERE'S A GREAT DEAL OF CHALLENGE AND CURIOSITY AND
